column5: Seems like a simple question, but I'm leaving for 3 mile lake for a week on Saturday and I'm wondering if I can take my girlfriends card in with me and renew her sticker?  Thanks!
Don't think so - I had to show "other" id in order to renew mine.  Pretty sure the Walmart guy typed something in the machine to reflect I used my driver's license.  Michael
Ya you can, I got someone elses this yr..
It is very easy now, just go on-line to: http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/OC/2ColumnSubPage/STDU_137924.html  Make sure you have her Outdoors Card number, her postal code, DOB and a credit card
Just need her drivers license or a copy of it... All the info they need is there...
do it online - print out a temporary..i think

Name, DOB, Height, Eye Colour and Address is all you need. ID is not required to buy a fishing license, we ask for it simply because a drivers license has all the info we are required to enter. you can not be denied a fishing license because you dont have ID
the only info the machines collect is name, DOB, height, eye colour, address, Phone number and the licenses you wish to purchase (also whether or not you wish to receive correspondence)
I think you can renew through an Ontario Govt Kiosk at a shopping centre.....
